mapper.select:
SELECT T.*, REQ_QTY - ORDRG_QTY AS REMAIN_QTY FROM ( SELECT A.CO_CD , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.REQ_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') REQ_DT , A.REQ_SEQ , (SELECT PRJCT_NM FROM TB_SD05M01 WHERE PRJCT_CD = A.PRJCT_CD) AS PRJCT_NM , A.PRJCT_CD , A.SITE_CD , (SELECT SITE_NM FROM TB_SD09M01 WHERE SITE_CD = A.SITE_CD) AS SITE_NM , A.WH_CD , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(A.WH_CD) WH_NM , A.TYP_CD , A.IMP_YN , A.DLVR_DTTM , A.REQ_RMK , A.TOT_QTY , A.TOT_WT , A.REQ_MNG_ID , A.ORDRG_YN , A.RECPT_YN , B.ORDRG_SEQ , A.REQ_CREAT_DIV , SUM(B.REQ_QTY) REQ_QTY , (SELECT SUM(REAL_DLVR_QTY) FROM TB_OD01D01 OD01D01 WHERE OD01D01.ORDRG_SEQ = B.ORDRG_SEQ) ORDRG_QTY FROM TB_OD02M01 A , TB_OD02D01 B WHERE A.REQ_SEQ = B.REQ_SEQ AND A.ORDRG_YN = 'N'
AND A.CO_CD = #{coCd1}
AND B.PRDT_DIV IN (SELECT DISTINCT PRDT_DIV FROM TB_BM01M01 WHERE PRDT_GRP = #{prdtGrp1} )
GROUP BY A.CO_CD , A.REQ_DT , A.REQ_SEQ , A.PRJCT_CD , A.SITE_CD , A.WH_CD , A.TYP_CD , A.IMP_YN , A.DLVR_DTTM , A.REQ_RMK , A.TOT_QTY , A.TOT_WT , A.REQ_MNG_ID , A.ORDRG_YN , B.ORDRG_SEQ , A.RECPT_YN , A.REQ_CREAT_DIV ORDER BY REQ_DT, REQ_SEQ ) T
